titles.title: Bolts Ditch Act
Bolts Ditch Act
Bolts Ditch Act

To amend the John D. Dingell, Jr. Conservation, Management, and Recreation Act to allow for additional entities to be eligible to complete the maintenance work on Bolts Ditch and the Bolts Ditch Headgate within the Holy Cross Wilderness, Colorado.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.
Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 118-719.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 607.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Discharged, Referred To

bill.summary:
Bolts Ditch Act
This bill designates additional entities (the Eagle River Water and Sanitation District and the Upper Eagle Regional Water Authority) that may maintain Bolts Ditch and the Bolts Ditch Headgate within the Holy Cross Wilderness in Colorado.
